title: Connection Issues at start of patch cycles
body:
Patch releases involved about 3-7 days of me not being able to connect. This was happening I estimate about 50% of patches since season 3. As of season 5, I've been noticing that every single patch cycle comes with this issue. And it's always just as a new patch (or hotfix in one case) comes out.

To clarify, double-clicking the desktop icon to start the launcher will start the little splash screen box, but it hangs there for a minute before telling me it can't connect. It doesn't even make it to the patcher proper.

I have also been submitting network logs over the last two years, but not always. (Sometimes I'm not really that bothered, so I'll just go play something else.)

Screenshot attached. It's what happens on the day of patch releases, and then for another 3-7 days afterwards. Using a PC with Windows 7 (classic interface, but that shouldn't impact anything).

EDIT: Admin launcher has exactly the same issue, both now and in the past.
Some patches I've done a clean re-install.
Doesn't solve the issue though. Still have to wait out the 3-7 days.

EDIT: I'm unable to connect to the Support website at the moment.
Probably not related, as I've been able to connect to Support even while having this issue in the past.

replies.body: Try opening it from the Admin Launcher

Have been doing that. Some patch cycles I even do a clean install.
Doesn't solve anything though.
